title: Soul Stripper
description: It's called Sin City for a reason. Nowhere else are the temptations so great, the sex so good, and the demons so bad...By day, Monica is a barista in a local caf√©. It doesn't pay a lot but it puts her up close and personal with her sexy boss, Drew. Unfortunately that's as far as a succubus can go unless she wants to take his soul. Monica needs mind blowing sex to sustain her and she finds her victims every night at a local strip club where she's an exotic dancer. But when her powers begin to diminish and her fellow succubi start turning up dead, all bets are off. Monica realizes she's the one immortal who has a chance in hell of making things right...
author: Katana Collins
